note.p: Education: Nelson College, New Zealand; Auckland University College. DSc (1917)
Career: Clerk in Holy Orders; lecturer in charge of the Botanical Department, University of Otago (NZ)
Obituaries: Obituary Notices of Fellows of the Royal Society 1945-1948 vol 5 pp 425-444, plate, by W H Lang
References: Robin J H Clark and Michael J Kelly, 'New Zealand, New Zealanders and the Royal Society' in NR 1994 vol 48 pp 263-281
R W Home, 'The Royal Society and the Empire: the colonial and Commonwealth Fellowship. Part 2. After 1847' in NR 2003 vol 57 pp 47-84
